iti28:2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
iti28:2.2_0: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti28:2.4_0: Indriyesu aguttadvāratāya ca, bhojane amattaññutāya ca.
iti28:2.5_1: dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
iti28:2.6_0: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti28:6.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
